metadata.title: CVE-2013-4156 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
Apache OpenOffice.org (OOo) before 4.0 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (memory corruption) or possibly have unspecified otherimpact via a crafted element in an OOXML document file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4156` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

browser-plugin-libreoffice - 1:4.2.3~rc3-0ubuntu2
libreoffice - 1:4.2.3~rc3-0ubuntu2
libreoffice-avmedia-backend-gstreamer - 1:4.2.3~rc3-0ubuntu2
